definition: persevere and you will succeed (idiom); where there's a will, there's a way

sentences.english: Important than the survival of success.

sentences.english: "Each to his own, " she said with a shrug, and turned away.

sentences.english: As the saying goes, "those are not high, no long-life air-chi."
